main event: Multiple witnesses observed a yellow-orange colored UFO with flashing lights in Shreveport, Louisiana on February 15, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes,The object was reported to move in a straight flight pattern without flickering or changing brightness,Two other observations occurred on February 18 and 19, 1962 involving a blue flame with trailing red,Objects appeared to evade sighting successfully during observations,Investigated by Air Force personnel.
sighted object: yellow-orange colored UFO with flashing lights
